Description

This application provides information about the best selling books based on New York Times ratings.

Features

There are a range of categories to choose from and each category contains a list of books. Each book contains various details along with a list of link of sites from which to buy the book from.

Categories and books once loaded are cached on the phone for faster loading. Swiping down to refresh would fetch a fresh list of categories or books.

One can also bookmark books for viewing later outside of the various category lists.
This application was built using the New York Times Books API
